subject: p15259244
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there is continued diffuse bilateral pulmonary opacifications consistent with worsening effusions, volume loss, and increased pulmonary vascular congestion. Possibility of supervening pneumonia must be seriously considered in the appropriate clinical setting, though this is difficult to evaluate in view of the substrate of extensive pulmonary changes.
